title: My Mr. Soldier - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Betrayal   Female Protagonist   Military   Modern Day   R*pe   S*xual Abuse
author: Hai Zhi Xing Chen   海之星辰
description:
The most miserable thing for Cheery Shen was that her sister betrayed her and had sex with her boyfriend - John Ye.

Jackson Chu, the most promissing young soldier, was bored with the endless blind dates arranged by his grandfather. To get rid of it, he decided to marry a woman he doesn't love at all.

'John Ye, I can't marry you. But I will marry your uncle! You have to call me Auntie Cherry!'

When destiny brings them together, see what will happen then!>
